name: Turtle Basking Platform & Dock - Stainless Steel Turtle Ramp, Non-Slip Surface - Fits 10-13 Inch Wide Aquariums
short_description: Compatible Aquarium: Please measure the width of the aquarium before purchasing, It is suitable for aquariums with a width of 10 - 13 inches

Non-slip Ramp: The turtle ramp is partially hollowed out to enhance grip and prevent slipping. For added safety, a non-slip mat is now included in the package. The ramp provides solid and stable support, ensuring that turtles of all sizes can climb smoothly and effortlessly

Polycarbonate Material:High light transmittance ensures full penetration of light through the basking platform, creating a bright and warm environment for your turtle to bask. The high transparency of polycarbonate allows you to clearly observe your turtle's activities, maintaining excellent visibility while enhancing the aesthetic appeal of the turtle basking platform

304 Stainless Steel: The top and base of the turtle basking platform are constructed with 304 stainless steel, specifically engineered for humid aquatic environments. It offers exceptional durability and easy cleaning, creating a healthier habitat for turtles

Expanded Space: The turtle basking platform significantly broadens your pet's activity range, providing a dedicated area where turtles can safely enjoy light exposure. Meanwhile, it offers keepers a new perspective, enhancing the pleasure of turtle keeping
Assembly Required: To ensure safe and convenient shipping, this product requires a few minutes of simple assembly and comes with an installation guide

Anti-Escape Side Panels: Aquatic turtles are natural climbers and explorers that can easily escape from unguarded ramps. To address this, we added protective side panels to both sides of the basking slope. This design eliminates the risk of your turtle climbing out of the aquarium, preventing potential injuries or loss

name: Adjustable Hanging Turtle Basking Platform with Artificial Grass 13 x 6.9 Inch Sturdy Acrylic Aquatic Reptile Ramp Dock Fits 0.3"-2" Thick Tank Salamander Frog Turtle Tank Accessories
short_description: Natural Ecological Simulation for Turtle Comfort: the turtle basking platform, measuring about 13 x 6.9 inches, includes an artificial grass surface, offering a firm grip and effective anti-slip feature; This design allows turtles to easily climb and enjoy sunbathing while feeling comfortable and secure, recreating a natural outdoor environment to enhance their well-being

Adjustable Design for Versatile Adaptation: the versatility of our turtle basking platform is highlighted by its adjustable ramp and hook design, which accommodates turtle tanks with wall thicknesses from 0.3 inches to 2 inches; Adjustable placement allows the ramp to be positioned at the front or side, making it adaptable to a wide variety of tank layouts and water levels; This ensures precise compatibility with most turtle breeding environments

Aesthetically Pleasing and Long Lasting: constructed from quality transparent acrylic, this aquatic reptile ramp dock is both sturdy and visually appealing; The crystal-clear appearance enhances the overall beauty of your turtle tank, while offering long-term resilience against fading or deformation; The removable grass feature simplifies cleaning and maintenance, ensuring the platform remains pristine

Expansive Space for Multiple Reptiles: designed to accommodate large reptiles, this turtle platform offers a spacious sunning area suitable for multiple pets to bask simultaneously; The reliable structure supports turtles safely, while the adjustable ramp direction adapts to different tank layouts; This flexibility ensures easy movement for turtles to ascend and descend, maximizing their sunbathing opportunities

Health Booster Through Encouraged Activity: our turtle basking dock supports turtle health by encouraging regular climbing and sunbathing, effectively preventing shell softening and enhancing metabolism; Made from quality acrylic, it ensures safe water quality, contributing to a nurturing habitat; This essential accessory is not only practical, but an ideal gift, embodying both love and enjoyment for your pets

name: Turtle Basking Platform for 10-13 Inchs Wide Aquariums - Last Long Stainless Steel Supports & Mesh, Non-Slip Ramp for Aquatic Turtles, Turtle Tank Accessories(Large)
short_description: ATTENTION! Always measure the exact dimensions​(Length, width, height) of turtle tank before you buy. For tanks with a rim, ensure your measurements include the rim​ to guarantee a proper fit. The Large size Fit for 10-13 inch wide aquariums, such as Standard Aquariums 30/38/45/55 Gallon.

This large turtle basking platform measures 8.6x13.5x9.4 inches, providing ample dry area for aquatic turtles to bask and rest comfortably in home aquariums, promoting healthy shell drying and UVB exposure for pets like red eared sliders.

Constructed with a 0.5-inch stainless steel mesh top and 0.2-inch thick acrylic panels, this above tank dock ensures long-lasting durability and resistance to rust, offering a sturdy resting spot for turtles without occupying swimming space.

Featuring a 30-degree incline ramp made of 8.25-inch long acrylic with a non-slip surface, it allows easy climbing for turtles to access the basking area safely, reducing stress and preventing slips during daily use.

The acrylic side barriers effectively prevent escapes, ensuring your aquatic pets remain secure while basking; this design is ideal for active turtles in standard tanks up to 55 gallons, providing peace of mind for owners.

With a simple assembly process that takes under 20 minutes, this turtle platform can be easily set up on aquariums 12-13 inches wide, such as 45 or 55-gallon tanks, making it a user-friendly accessory for busy pet enthusiasts.

The stainless steel mesh supports heat lamps directly, creating an optimal basking zone for turtles to regulate temperature; this feature enhances the habitat for species like painted turtles in indoor aquarium setups.

As an above tank basking platform, it frees up 100% of the water volume for swimming, ideal for large aquatic turtles in spacious environments like 90-gallon aquariums, ensuring a natural and exploratory habitat.

Designed to fit a range of standard tanks from 30 to 55 gallons (40 breeder gallon not included), this dock serves as a versatile turtle tank accessory, supporting various aquatic pets and simplifying maintenance for a healthier pet lifestyle.

name: Large Turtle Floating Basking Platform with Feeding Area, Turtle Floating Docks Reptile Climbing Pier and Basking Platform for Tortoise, Frogs, Crabs and Salamanders
short_description: Specifications: The floating pier dock is 16" (L) x 11” (W) x 4.33" (H), suitable for turtle tanks of 30 gallons or larger. In addition, the pylon supports are adjustable in height, from as low as 4.33” for setups without water, and up to 16” with water. Please check the size of your turtle tank before purchasing to make sure it will fit

Interesting Design: The turtle pier with a floating island design, the triangle plane of the platform will naturally float according to the depth of the water level, so you can easily adjust its height. What's more! We will send you 3 spring clip collars for free, it can be clipped on the support pole, even when the turtle gets heavy, it can ensure that the platform stays on the water, while providing a dry area for the aquatic turtle

Stable & Reliable: Rptile pier rests upon 3 pylon supports that are attached with suction cups that connect to the bottom surface of a tank. For a strong and secure bond, we have additionally equipped with 3 strong suction cups, ensuring it stays in place and won't tip over in your turtle tank

Ideal Place for Reptile Sunbathing: Turtle resting terrace equipped with a textured ladder, they can easy to climb on the platform to play and feed and enjoy bathing in the natural sun. It can also be a hide place for our pet. Perfect for turtles, salamander, frog, newts and other aquatic pets
After-Service: We hope the quality of our products will satisfy you. If you get quality problems with this product, please feel free to contact us in the first time
